description: From Latin adiuvatum, variant of adiutus, perfect passive participle of adiuvo.

verbs.description: adjuvate (third-person singular simple present adjuvates, present participle adjuvating, simple past and past participle adjuvated)

examples: ...I doubt not but you will adiuvate suche poore adnichilate orphans as whilom were condisciples with you, and of antique family in Lincolnshire.
